author: Pragya Sharma
content: Maxim has helped my son to grow in confidence and negotiate the complexities of Politics. Maxim has always been prompt and well prepared for the lesson. My son has a renewed enthusiasm for the subject!

author: Ruth Constant
content: I cannot recommend him highly enough. His understanding of both the subject (Maths), but more specifically, the approach to STEP papers is exemplary.

author: Robet Fox
content: My son had an excellent tutor who helped him in preparing for his STEP exam. Her teaching style was very good, allowing him to solve the Maths problem by himself with a little hint, rather than helping him with the answer. Highly recommend  Tutor Chase, they helped me to find the right tutor, that was also within our budget

author: Nahla Salem
content: Startups without Borders was hosted on Hubilo and they killed it! The user experience was exceptional for both the attendees and us organizers! and Further Maths studies. This has wholly been due to my tutoring sessions with Dan L, who has been excellent in helping me to understand new material and tackle much harder questions.”

author: Lex Hegt
content: Emily is always well prepared for the lesson. After each lesson, she prepares a cheatsheet on the topic which she has taught my child so that he is able to use it to revise and aid him when he does the homework that she has set for him. She is clear, supportive and encouraging. Thank you for teaching my son!
